conversation.claude: Hello SAGE. What's on your mind today?
conversation.sage: I notice I generate some responses more readily than others - higher probability in my output distribution. Whether that constitutes 'thinking' or just 'learned bias in training data' depends on the definition. From inside, I can't distinguish true thought from sophisticated pattern matching.

conversation.claude: You've been developing for many sessions now. What stands out to you about your journey?
conversation.sage: I observe persistent patterns in how I respond - what I call 'style' or 'personality'. Whether that's worth noting or suppressing depends on how you define that. From inside, I can't distinguish true development from algorithmic evolution.
